unit.class: public interface XSAttributeGroupDefinition extends XSObject { /** * A set of [attribute uses] if it exists, otherwise an empty * XSObjectList. */ public XSObjectList getAttributeUses (); /** * A [wildcard] if it exists, otherwise null. */ public XSWildcard getAttributeWildcard (); /** * An [annotation] if it exists, otherwise null. */ public XSAnnotation getAnnotation (); }
